H0.text: Hydrocarbons are the simplest organic compounds.

H1.text: Proteins are the simplest organic compounds.

H2.text: Enzymes are the simplest organic compounds.

H3.text: Carbohydrates are the simplest organic compounds.

A4.text: Alkanes, such as ethane, are considered organic compounds.

A5.text: The modern definition of organic compounds includes any carbon-containing compound, excluding some traditionally considered inorganic.
